name: M2J Think Box
tag_list: software-development, app-development, mobile-development, myhubpass, vidual, cloudtext, golfcliq, cloud-based-software
overview:
M2J Think Box is a software and app development company, specializing in enterprise software, innovative mobile applications and products designed for unique business processes.

Our industry-first applications and products such as Vidual, My HubPass, Customer Vine, GolfCliq, CloudText™ and TouchTop are revolutionizing how individuals and companies work, play and communicate.

M2J Software is currently being utilized by several Fortune 500 companies including Cigna who currently operates their Cigna Plus Savings web site on our Customer Vine platform to manage their call center, recurring billing and fulfillment. Live Nation and Mamba (part of the Storck family) are also leveraging the Customer Vine platform to manage upcoming contests and promotions.

Our partners lead from more than 30 years of experience in software development, marketing and consulting. This allows M2J Think Box to offer unique and thoroughly designed solutions that adhere to today’s changing environment.

milestones.description: Live Nation and Mamba USA are launching their upcoming promotions/contests on our Customer Vine platform.
milestones.source_description: Live Nation and Mamba USA using M2J Think Box software
